2013 Toyota FJ Cruiser 4.0 Sport Automatic for sale. Don't miss this beautifully kept 4x4 Cruiser! Very popular and rare to find.
Standard Features: ABS Brakes | Air Conditioning | Airbags | Alarm | Central Locking | Cruise Control | Hill Descent Control | Diff Lock | Electric Windows | Fog Lights | Full Spare Wheel | Power Steering | Radio/CD | Rear Windshield Defroster | Roof Rails and much more.
Car comes with full service history, books and spare keys.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Power - 200 kW @ 5600 rpm

Gears - 5 / ALL
